sentences.english: The verification and measurement plan of checking fixture dimension should be confirmed by YFV engineer.
sentences.chinese: 檢具的尺寸驗證測量計劃需得到延鋒工程師的確認。

sentences.english: Make sure none of the audio components are positioned too close to the TV set.
sentences.chinese: 確認各聲頻設備是否太靠近電視機。

sentences.english: The cases have been laboratory confirmed by the Institut Pasteur, Dakar.
sentences.chinese: 這些病例已得到達喀爾巴斯德研究所的實驗室確認。

sentences.english: Our trade terms are the same as the stipulations in the S/C No. 101.
sentences.chinese: 其他交易條件與101號銷售確認書中的規定相同。

sentences.english: The referee didn't blow his whistle at all and Nani actually looked at him to check.
sentences.chinese: 裁判沒有吹哨，納尼看着裁判想確認狀況。

sentences.english: All the quotation on the list are subject to our final confirmation.
sentences.chinese: 單中所有價格以我方最後確認爲準。

sentences.english: Is a first article run prior to etching the lot to confirm etcher settings and linewidths?
sentences.chinese: 在批量蝕刻前是否進行首件與確認蝕刻機設備與線徑？

sentences.english: No such meeting has been confirmed.
sentences.chinese: 目前尚未確認會有這樣一個會議。

sentences.english: The attacker was identified by the state-run Xinhua news agency as Wu Huanming, 48.
sentences.chinese: 中國新華社確認了該襲擊者名爲吳煥明，四十八歲。

sentences.english: A dispatch confirmation notice was sent to the customer.
sentences.chinese: 向客戶發送派送確認通知。

sentences.english: Vibrio cholerae 01 sero type inaba has been confirmed in some of the affected areas.
sentences.chinese: 在有些疫區已確認存在01稻葉血清型霍亂弧菌。

sentences.english: What is good with personal loan is that it does not require credit checks.
sentences.chinese: 小金額個人貨物款的一個好處是它不需要確認信用度。

sentences.english: Furthermore, over the past four years, the process of issuing these documents has been tediously slow.
sentences.chinese: 而且，在過去四年中，這個確認過程非常的緩慢。

sentences.english: Or she might avoid going to the doctor to avoid confirmation of her fears.
sentences.chinese: 或許她可能會躲着醫生，以避免當面確認她的恐懼。

sentences.english: I am sorry, you haven't reconfirmed your seat.
sentences.chinese: 對不起，您還沒有確認您的座位。

sentences.english: You'll need to scout ahead to make sure Basso's route is safe.
sentences.chinese: 你需要在前面偵察，確認巴索要走的路線是安全的。

definition: definite/certain/fixed/to fix (on sth)/to determine/to be sure/to ensure/to make certain/to ascertain/to clinch/to recognize/to confirm/OK (on computer dialog box)
to inspect and verify/experimental verification/to validate (a theory)/to authenticate
outcome/result/conclusion/in the end/as a result/to kill/to dispatch
proof/certificate/identification/testimonial/CL:個|个[ge4]/to prove/to testify/to confirm the truth of
to have sth to do with/to relate to/related to/to concern/concerning
to advance/to conduct/underway/in progress/to do/to carry out/to carry on/to execute
to maintain (that sth is true)/to determine (a fact)/determination (of an amount)/of the firm opinion/to believe firmly/to set one's mind on/to identify with
